title: Real Talk; why do people still play this game?
body:
Really? By any sensible logic, this game should be absolutely deserted and Riot a mockery of the development community. Let's take a look at the last *30 days*, shall we?

- Daruis becomes broken; disabled
- Caitlyn gets a new bug; disabled
- Runeglaive real eased without proper testing; unleashes havoc on Jungle and Mid Lane {{champion:81}} 
- An item has to be disabled for literally breaking the entire game
- devourer changes go through despite the community complaints; breaks every single lane and Jungle
- Zed gets a massive bug; has to be completely disabled

*And that is just 30 freaking days*. There are goddamn Betas that perform better than this.

Not to mention the absolute litany of other problems the game and Riot have. So seriously; why the hell is this game still so popular?

*"But muh gameplay."*

People don't even seem to enjoy the gameplay that much, in-game or in communities.
